channel.title: CVE Feed for ASUSTOR -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ASUSTOR -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-37398|2024-08-03T10:29:21.143Z -- asustor -- adm
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability was found inside ADM when using WebDAV due to the lack of data size validation. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to run arbitrary code. Affected ADM versions include: 3.5.9.RUE3 and below, 4.0.5.RVI1 and below as well as 4.1.0.RJD1 and below.
